sentences: Dariusz "Daray" Brzozowski (born 30 January 1980), is a Polish heavy metal drummer.

Brzozowski has played with such bands as Vader, Black River, Jelonek, Armagedon, Arysta, Azarath, Faust, Neolithic, Crionics, Autumn: Death, Imperial Age, Kayzen, Crystal Abyss, Nerve, Insidious Disease and Pyorrhoea.
He currently plays in Dimmu Borgir, Vesania, Symbolical, Hunter, and Masachist.
